Package com.ibm.team.repository.client

Provides the main client-side-only APIs for the Repository component.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ICertificateHandler Handler for validating the certificate presented by a server when establishing an SSL connection.
IContentManager Methods for storing and retrieving contents from the repository.
IContentManagerInputStreamProvider An interface for a class that can continue opening an InputStream on the same resource for the benefit of the content manager.
IContentManagerSession Encapsulates a file transfer session for the IContentManager.
IContributorManager A contributor manager for a particular team repository.
IDeferredSecuredLoginInfo  
IDeferredSecuredLoginInfo.ISecuredLoginPropertiesCallback Defers the fetching of the secured login properties when ready.
IDownloadHandler Accepts events regarding a download being managed by a IContentManagerSession.
IExternalUserRegistryManager  
IItemManager An item manager for a particular team repository.
ILicenseClient  
ILoginHandler2 Handler for acquiring user id and password when a repository is about to be logged in to with #login(), or whenever the repository decides to challenge an already logged-in client (as determined by that repository's security policies).
ILoginInfo2 ILoginInfo2 provides the functionality of encapsulating credentials that are custom to the method that is being used and also provides a way to use those credentials by passing those off to ITeamServer.
IOAuthClientLibrary A library that helps ease the use of OAuth connections between two team repositories.
ISharedItemChangeEvent Represents an event describing a change to a shared item.
ISharedItemChangeListener Listener for changes to shared items.
IStatistics Statistics data for a particular team repository.
ITeamRepository Represents a team repository.
ITeamRepository.ILoginHandler Handler for acquiring user id and password when a repository is about to be logged in to with #login(), or whenever the repository decides to challenge an already logged-in client (as determined by that repository's security policies).
ITeamRepository.ILoginHandler.ILoginInfo Simple data structure encapsulating both a user id and a password.
ITeamRepository.ILoginParticipant Login participant interface to be implemented by clients that are interested in contributing to the login/logout function.
ITeamRepositoryService Service for establishing contact with team repositories.
ITeamRepositoryService.IRepositoryServiceListener Listener interface used to listen to repository additions and removals from the team repository service.
IUploadHandler Accepts events regarding a upload being managed by a IContentManagerSession and provides data needed to upload content.
 

Class Summary
ICertificateHandler.Trust Action to take for a server-supplied certificate.
TeamPlatform The central class of the IBM Team Platform.
 

Exception Summary
SavedPasswordNotObtainedException Passwords are stored in eclipse using the secure storage integration api.
ServerStateCheckException  
ServerVersionCheckException Deprecated.
 

Package com.ibm.team.repository.client Description

Provides the main client-side-only APIs for the Repository component.

Package Specification

The API is used by a client to communicate with a team server/repository.

Main entry class is TeamPlatform.
